original_text: by some that Elijah had appeared, and by others that one of the prophets of old had risen.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 엘리야가 나타났다고도 하며 어떤 사람은 옛 선지자 한 사람이 다시 살아났다고도 함이라

sentences.original_text: by some that Elijah had appeared
by others that one of the prophets of old had risen
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들은 옛 선지자 중 하나가 살아났다고
